item.title: Stephen King's 2025 Book Should Lean Into The Best Part Of You Like It Darker
item.description: Never Flinch is bound to be a thrilling ride, but Stephen King’s 2025 book should learn from the biggest strength of 2024’s You Like It Darker.

item.title: 10 Longest Movies Released In 2024, Ranked By Runtime
item.description: Ten 2024 movies pushed the limit by offering extended runtimes, raising the question: did they deserve that long of the audience's attention?

item.title: Jackie Chan's Greatest Kung Fu Fantasy Movie Is The Best Live-Action Dragon Ball Adaptation We're Going To Get
item.description: Live-action anime adaptations usually have a bad reputation, but an epic Jackie Chan fantasy film qualifies as a great live-action take on Dragon Ball
